Introduction

Daisy is a South Korean singer and former member of the girl group MOMOLAND, previously managed by MLD Entertainment. She joined the group in 2017 but officially departed on May 13, 2020.

Daisy became a subject of public attention following a KBS News 9 interview aired on January 7, 2020. In the segment, she alleged that Finding Momoland, the survival show that formed the group, had been manipulated, claiming her inclusion was pre-decided and that members were later billed for production expenses.

She also revealed a dispute with her agency, stating she was barred from group promotions since May 2019 and was asked to pay a 1.1 billion won penalty when she requested contract termination. MLD Entertainment denied these claims, labeling them one-sided.

Legal proceedings followed, and on October 10, 2021, the Seoul Central District Court ruled in Daisy’s favor. The court ordered MLD to pay her over 92 million won in unpaid earnings and damages. MLD subsequently filed an appeal the next day, continuing the legal dispute.
